text: The Geomori (, 'land-sharers') were a group in a number of archaic Greek cities: * Geomori (Athens), an obscure group in pre-Solonian Athens (7th century BC); * Geomori (Samos), who ruled Samos in the early 6th century BC and possibly before; * Geomori (Syracuse), who ruled Syracuse until c. 485 BC.
title: Geomori
